data.eml:eml: Paguristioneuniuropodus, a new genus and a new species of Pseudioninae infesting hermit crabs from China (Crustacea, Isopoda, Bopyridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article An, Jianmei, Zhao, Qiuping, Markham, John C. (2016): Paguristioneuniuropodus, a new genus and a new species of Pseudioninae infesting hermit crabs from China (Crustacea, Isopoda, Bopyridae). ZooKeys 577: 43-53, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.577.6295, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.577.6295
